name: Abhishek Veeramalla
tagline: Founder of AKVA, Docker Captain, and YouTube educator with 500K+ subscribers teaching DevOps
bio: Abhishek Veeramalla is the Founder & CTO of AKVA and a Principal Software Engineer at Red Hat. A Docker Captain and GitHub Star, he's built a community of 500K+ YouTube subscribers and 150K+ LinkedIn followers, helping thousands land DevOps jobs through comprehensive free courses.
